channel.title: Halcyon-Rsps V2 Is Finally Back!|The Server About You!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Halcyon-V2 has come back! Halcyon-V2 I based off of what the players want not Owners. It is called the server about you. It has taken me awhile to make this server I am very proud of it, it has a lot of great work in it and I hope you guys like it. Owner: Matt
[URL=http://halcyon.x10.mx/]Website[/URL] [URL=http://halcyon.x10.mx/forums/]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://halcyon.x10.mx/webclient.html]Web client[/URL] [URL=http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/cvdp6f6d2cogmg8/Halcyon-Rsps.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAG8QrAxxG95wnNialObYFyH6Hb_0l5i1OB3-f7zYVR3MA]Download Link[/URL]
Features Penguins Sponge Bob Picachu Good Drops (At the new ::train you don’t kill for drops, you kill for Training Points, a point system made by me then you buy stuff at the shops.) Lodestone Network Money Pouch Full screen Sequel of fortune Custom interface Staff list New Home Account Menu Loyalty Points Training at home All Skill working New Donator zone There is a lot more it would take too long to show.
Thing I’m working on now
Customs Better Interfaces New maps Bank tabs There is more but I can’t think of any off the top of my head.
Pictures!
Home! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tccp5zY.png[/img]
Training Zone! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8YgMBeL.png[/img]
Will Add more Pictures Later! Hope You Come To Join!
[/CENTER]
